data.title: Bandcamp
data.meta_description: Discover amazing music and directly support the artists who make it.
data.text:
Bandcamp Weekly August 13, 2024

Esparanza Spalding chats about her new LP with Milton Nascimento and collab with Nubya Garcia, plus Orlas & Claude Fontaine drop by.

Hosted by Andrew Jervis. Illustration of Esperanza Spalding by Noopur Choksi.

Desert Heat: Diving Into the Arizona Hip-Hop Scene

Though often unjustly overlooked, the Grand Canyon State is exploding with life.
